# 🏗️ Cloud Revenue vs Costs by Region - Q2 2025

## 📊 Area Chart: Revenue vs Costs by Region

```chart { "type": "legend-area-chart", "title": "Q2 2025 Revenue vs Costs by Region", "description": "Area chart comparing cloud revenue and operational costs by region.", "dataKey": "amount", "groupedKeys": ["Revenue", "Costs"], "color": ["hsl(145, 70%, 45%)", "hsl(10, 80%, 55%)"], "legend": true, "data": [ { "region": "North America", "Revenue": 8.6, "Costs": 4.3 }, { "region": "Europe", "Revenue": 6.1, "Costs": 3.2 }, { "region": "Asia-Pacific", "Revenue": 5.4, "Costs": 2.9 }, { "region": "South America", "Revenue": 3.3, "Costs": 1.7 }, { "region": "Middle East", "Revenue": 2.7, "Costs": 1.4 } ] } ```

---

## 🔍 Observations
- **North America** maintains the highest revenue and cost levels.
- **Europe** outpaces **Asia-Pacific** in revenue but has slightly higher costs.
- **South America** and **Middle East** contribute modestly but show efficient cost structures.
